meaningMnemonic: I am <kanji>sad</kanji> and <kanji>pathetic</kanji> in how I feel. Such a deep <vocabulary>sorrow</vocabulary>! Such <vocabulary>grief</vocabulary> from my sad pathetic feelings.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
